description.zh-cn: 中国警衔体系的第5等级，由公安部部长授予副厅级、正处级以及专业技术高级警官。
description.en: The 5th rank in the Chinese police rank system, conferred by the Minister of Public Security to officers at the deputy department level, section chief level, and senior professional and technical officers.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，是三级警监警衔制度的所在地。
description.en: A country in East Asia, home to the Third Level Police Supervisor rank system.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔
en: Police Ranks of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察的警衔体系。
description.en: The rank system for the People's Police of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门。其部长负责授予三级警监警衔。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of public security work nationwide. Its minister is responsible for conferring the Third Level Police Supervisor rank.

nodes.id: 人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法

zh-cn: 人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法
en: Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks

description.zh-cn: 由最高人民法院、最高人民检察院、公安部、国家安全部及司法部于1995年联合颁布实施，规定了人民警察选升警衔的标准。
description.en: Jointly promulgated and implemented in 1995 by the Supreme People's Court, Supreme People's Procuratorate, Ministry of Public Security, Ministry of State Security, and Ministry of Justice, it stipulates the criteria for the selection and promotion of people's police ranks.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高审判机关，参与联合颁布了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China, which participated in the joint promulgation of the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高法律监督机关，参与联合颁布了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: The highest legal supervisory organ of the People's Republic of China, which participated in the joint promulgation of the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部
en: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管国家安全的组成部门，参与联合颁布了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of national security, which participated in the joint promulgation of the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国司法部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国司法部
en: Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管司法行政工作的组成部门，参与联合颁布了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of judicial administrative work, which participated in the joint promulgation of the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

description.zh-cn: 中国警衔体系中的一个等级，是晋升为三级警监的必要条件之一。
description.en: A rank in the Chinese police rank system, and a prerequisite for promotion to Third Level Police Supervisor.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人民警察

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察
en: People's Police of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家警察力量。
description.en: The national police force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国警衔体系中的一个高级警衔，等级高于二级警监。
description.en: A high-ranking police rank in the Chinese police rank system, senior to the Second Level Police Supervisor.

description.zh-cn: 中国警衔体系中的一个高级警衔，等级高于三级警监。
description.en: A high-ranking police rank in the Chinese police rank system, senior to the Third Level Police Supervisor.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部部长负责授予三级警监警衔。
description.en: The Minister of Public Security of the People's Republic of China is responsible for conferring the rank of Third Level Police Supervisor.

relationships.source: 人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法

description.zh-cn: 该暂行办法规定了人民警察选升为三级警监的标准和条件。
description.en: This interim measure stipulates the standards and conditions for the People's Police to be selected and promoted to the rank of Third Level Police Supervisor.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
relationships.target: 人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院联合颁布实施了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: The Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China jointly promulgated and implemented the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

relationships.target: 人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法

description.zh-cn: 最高人民检察院联合颁布实施了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: The Supreme People's Procuratorate jointly promulgated and implemented the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

relationships.target: 人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法

description.en: The Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China jointly promulgated and implemented the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

relationships.target: 人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部联合颁布实施了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: The Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China jointly promulgated and implemented the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

relationships.target: 人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国司法部联合颁布实施了《人民警察选升警衔的暂行办法》。
description.en: The Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China jointly promulgated and implemented the 'Interim Measures for the Selection and Promotion of People's Police Ranks'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔

description.zh-cn: 三级警监是中国人民警察警衔体系的第5等级。
description.en: Third Level Police Supervisor is the 5th rank in the police rank system of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一级警督的警衔等级低于三级警监。
description.en: The rank of First Level Police Superintendent is subordinate to Third Level Police Supervisor.

description.zh-cn: 三级警监的警衔等级低于二级警监。
description.en: The rank of Third Level Police Supervisor is subordinate to Second Level Police Supervisor.

description.zh-cn: 二级警监的警衔等级低于一级警监。
description.en: The rank of Second Level Police Supervisor is subordinate to First Level Police Supervisor.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国人民警察

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察是中华人民共和国的国家警察力量。
description.en: The People's Police of the People's Republic of China is the national police force of the People's Republic of China.
